name: Slither
description: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.
keywords: alien,parasite,grindhouse film,scene after end credits,small town

review.author: andrewchristianjr
review.heading: AFFECTIONATE HOMAGE TO LOW BUDGET B HORROR MOVIES.
review.reviewBody: A horror comedy that doesn't take itself too seriously, and delivers scares and laughs in equal and effective measure, and serves as an affectionate homage to low budget B horror movies. Its over-the-top violence may be hard to watch, but its compelling performances, witty and clever script, stylish direction and stunning visual effects make for an entertaining and thrilling viewing experience.
